6.81: Searing Chains Reduced duration from 2/2/3/3 to 1/2/2/3. Rescaled damage per second from 40/60/80/100 to 80/60/120/100. total damage is still 80/120/240/300. Reduced  Sleight of Fist attack damage bonus against heroes from 30/60/90/120 to 20/40/60/80.
6.79: Activate Fire Remnant now destroys trees within a 200 radius around Ember Spirit while moving.
6.78: Added to Captain's Mode. Increased  Flame Guard damage per second from 30/35/40/45 to 30/40/50/60.
6.75: Reduced base armor from -1 to -2 (total armor is now 1.08). Increased  Fire Remnant rechargetime from 30 to 35. Reduced  Activate Fire Remnant damage per spirit from 120/160/200 to 100/150/200.
6.74: Reduced base armor from 0 to -1 (total armor is now 2.08). Reduced base  strength from 21 to 19. Reduced  Searing Chains max targets from 3 to 2. Reduced  Flame Guard magical damage barrier from 100/250/400/550 to 50/200/350/500. Reduced  Activate Fire Remnant damage per spirit from 140/180/220 to 120/160/200.
6.73c: Reduced  Flame Guard magical damage barrier from 150/300/450/600 to 100/250/400/550.  Increased  Activate Fire Remnant manacost from 100 to 150.
